data.text: I suspect the most likely outcome at this point is the idiotplex developing the view that putin is the only “real leader” who “stands against the Deep State”; if trump gets re-elected in 2024 I suspect trump and putin will get very, very cosy and we’re in for a bad time

putin is frighteningly good at infowar. trump, brexit, COVID conspiracies, gilet jaunes protests etc. were all battles in this war, and the west has lost all of them. He knows exactly how to get nations to weaken themselves whilst they genuinely feel it’s in their best interests

it will reach a point of absurdity where people will say they love putin and will mock you for suggesting they’ve been brainwashed by Kremlin propaganda. all the usual blocks are falling into place. the ukraine war is fake, victims are “crisis actors”, etc.
